generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road surface with white lane markings and a Mercedes-Benz logo in the foreground, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the left side of the road, separated from the road by a curb and some vegetation.
- vegetation: There are numerous trees and greenery visible in the background and along the sides of the road.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the road in the distance, under the overpass.
- car: Several cars are parked on the right side of the road, and a car is partially visible on the right side of the image.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible on the left side of the image.
- traffic sign: A circular traffic sign with an arrow is visible on the left side of the image.
- pole: Several poles are visible in the image, including the pole for the traffic light and the pole for the traffic sign.
- fence: A fence is visible in the background, behind the trees.
- terrain: There is some grass visible in the background, behind the trees.
